All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Base class for Actions.
    ActionInterface
    This interface provides the ability to add methods to Action, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.
    Actions
    A thin wrapper for java.util.ArrayList<Action> that does not allow nulls to be added.
    Actor  
    ActorInterface
    This interface provides the ability to add methods to Actor, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.
    ActorLocations
    Represents a bimap of locations and actors.
    AimAction
    Special action for aiming at other actors
    AimCapability
    An enum representing a collection of constants which indicate the capabilities of aiming.
    Application  
    Application  
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    Behaviour  
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
    Bomb
    A bomb which is a type of Item and hurt Actors when it explodes.
    Bug  
    Capabilities
    A collection of Capability objects.
    Capable
    An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum.
    ChantingBehaviour
    A class that generates a SummonZombieAction if the current Actor has a ZombieCapability.CHANT capability
    ConwayGameMap  
    ConwayLocation  
    Corpse
    A corpse item which is portable and created when an actor is dead.
    CraftingAction
    Special Action that allows actor to craft a weapon
    Crater  
    Crop
    A crop that ripes over time, can be sowed, fertilized when it is unripe and harvested when it is ripe.
    DemoCapabilities  
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    Display
    Class that manages I/O for the system
    DoNothingAction
    An Action that doesn't do anything.
    DropItemAction
    Special Action that allows Actors to drop items.
    EatAction
    Special Action that allows Actor to eat and recover health points.
    EatBehaviour
    A class that generates an EatAction if the current Actor is damaged and standing on a Food.
    Exit
    Class that represents a route from one Location to another.
    FancyGroundFactory
    Class that can create different types of Ground based on the character that represents it.
    Farmer
    Class representing a farmer which is a kind of human and also can sow, fertilize and harvest.
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertilizeAction
    Special Action for fertilizing an unripe Crop to decrease the time left to ripe.
    FertilizeBehaviour
    A class that generates a FertilizeAction if the current Actor is standing on an unripe Crop to fertilize it.
    FireRangedWeaponAction
    Special Action that allows Actor to fire ranged weapon.
    FireShotgunAction
    Special Action that allows Actor to fire shotgun towards the direction chosen.
    FireSniperRifleAction  
    FireSniperRifleAction
    Special Action for firing sniper rifle
    Floor  
    Floor  
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    Food
    A food item which is portable and can be eaten.
    GameMap
    Class representing one map within the system.
    Ground
    Class representing terrain type
    GroundCapability
    An enum representing a collection of constants which indicate the capabilities of a Ground.
    GroundFactory
    Interface for factory classes used by GameMap to create new map locations.
    GroundInterface
    This interface provides the ability to add methods to Ground, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.
    HarvestAction
    Special Action that allows Actor to harvest a ripe crop for food.
    HarvestBehaviour
    A class that generates a HarvestAction if the current Actor is standing on or next to a ripe Crop.
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    IntrinsicWeapon
    Class that represents a weapon for an unarmed Actor (e.g.
    Item
    Abstract base class representing a physical object in the game world.
    ItemCapability
    An enum representing a collection of constants which indicate the capabilities of an Item.
    ItemInterface
    This interface provides the ability to add methods to Ground, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.
    KickAction  
    LimbsCapability
    An enum representing a collection of constants which indicate the capabilities of a Limb.
    Location
    Class representing a location in the game map.
    LockedDoor  
    MamboMarie
    Class representing Mambo Marie
    MartianItem  
    Menu  
    MoveActorAction
    An Action that moves the Actor.
    NewWorld  
    NumberRange
    A class that represents an array of sequential numbers.
    PickUpItemAction
    Action to allow items to be picked up.
    PickUpWeaponBehaviour
    A class that generates a PickUpItemAction if the current Actor is standing on a location that has a weapon.
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    Printable
    Things that are Printable can appear in the user interface and therefore can be represented by a character in the UI.
    QuitGameAction
    Special Action that allows Player to quit the game.
    RangedWeapon
    An ranged weapon which is a type of weapon item which uses ammunition.
    ShootAction
    Special action for shooting at actors
    Shotgun
    A shotgun which is a type of ranged weapon that has a short range.
    SimpleClub
    A type of Weapon Item that only appears when a Zombie dropped its limb
    SniperRifle
    A sniple rifle which is a type of ranged weapon that rewards patience.
    SowAction
    Special Action for sowing a Crop.
    SowBehaviour
    A class that generates an SowAction if the current Actor is standing beside a Dirt to sow a crop on it.
    SpitBehaviour  
    Status  
    Stick  
    SummonZombieAction
    Special Action or summoning Zombie
    Tree  
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    VanishAction
    Special action for an actor to vanish
    Vehicle
    An item which represents a vehicle that moves actor to other map.
    Wall  
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Weapon
    Interface for weapon items.
    WeaponItem
    Class representing items that can be used as a weapon.
    WindowSmashAction  
    World
    Class representing the game world, including the locations of all Actors, the player, and the playing grid.
    Zombie
    A Zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieAttackAction
    Special Action that allows only Zombie to attack
    ZombieCapability
    An enum representing a collection of constants which indicate the capabilities of an Actor.
    ZombieClub
    A weapon item that is crafted by an actor from a zombie arm
    ZombieMace
    A weapon item that is crafted by an actor from a zombie leg
